title: Sonia Sabharwals New Book Alone, the Spiritual Awakening Within Takes Readers on a Journey of Self-awareness
text:
Recent release “Alone, the Spiritual Awakening Within” from Page Publishing author Sonia Sabharwal is an exploration of the infinite promise possessed deep within one’s soul.
(PRWEB) October 05, 2015
Sonia Sabharwal, a successful business leader and entrepreneur, has completed her first book “Alone, The Spiritual Awakening Within”: a fascinating and insightful examination of the possibilities that lie within every individual’s core.
“The stories contained within this book are a means of transportation to aid the awakening of others,” Sabharwal noted. “Not only do these stories serve humanity towards awareness, they are written for us to understand that we all have a key within us that unlocks our soul.”
Published by New York City-based Page Publishing, Sabharwal’s ascendant work imparts enlightenment to the mind through channeled information.
Encountering spiritual experiences since the age of seventeen, Sabharwal effectively underwent an insightful spiritual transformation which took birth within her and radically changed the course of her life since the beginning of this new millennium. She writes about how no other is responsible for what one attains, as everything is the consequence of one’s thought. The cause of whatever comes to one’s life is within one.
Readers who wish to experience this mesmerizing guide to enlightenment can purchase “Alone, the Spiritual Awakening Within” at bookstores everywhere, or online at the Apple iTunes store, Amazon, Google Play or Barnes and Noble.
For additional information or media inquiries, contact Page Publishing at 866-315-2708.
About Page Publishing
Page Publishing is a traditional New York based full-service publishing house that handles all of the intricacies involved in publishing its authors’ books, including distribution in the world’s largest retail outlets and royalty generation. Page Publishing knows that authors need to be free to create - not bogged down with complicated business issues like eBook conversion, establishing wholesale accounts, insurance, shipping, taxes and the like. Its roster of authors can leave behind these tedious, complex and time consuming issues, and focus on their passion: writing and creating. Learn more at http://www.pagepublishing.com .
